TopicTitle: Live Stream: The Kerbin Mission, Kerbin Academy...and other stuff !

Articles.Content:
Greets !

Streamin today and tonite ..........

Cdr Zeta

Hello,

Stream will be runnin off and on all day and night tonite. Twitch and OBS streamer seems to be having alot of disconnects lately so if the stream drops please wait it will be back up; annoying it is.

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

I will be streamin off and on all day and tonite !

I am upset tho now my KSP has reached the limit of it's capabilities regardless of Open Glide useage; it still has only 300 megs or so of game useage and crashes; must be played in windowed mode; and has a limit on the number of parts for efficient game play.

I forgot I upped the settings last nite so I will tear it down a tad again and see how performance improves; but part count is a kicker either way. I put up too much stuff in orbit; stations arent the main way to go unless they can be concise, compact, and efficient; ie old stations MUST be replaced (gamewise like bringing the old parts back down or destroying them.

With this new knowledge I press on ...

Cmdr Zeta

Greets,

I will be streamin landing attempts on the various moons around Kerbin and tryin to get the Science back !! Wish me luck !

Streams off and on til 9PM EST or there abouts and the continuous til midnite or so...I am not sure exactly when they will begin could be a little after 9PM...

Cmdr Zeta

Greets,

Stream is runnin...landin on 3 moons tonite in hopes for tons of Science back to Kerbin....

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

I been watchin others streams - some good some, well - odd ! But good !

I been doin good; workin up ideas for how I like to play KSP; with contracts coming up I will be restarting; I have increased the amount of Science points required in my career game to about 30% for all nodes; I think this is good and gives it a good challenge.

Only thing is; I am finding tricks now in KSP and it seems as tho it is better to have less in space and let time advance faster than normal for many aspects of the game; I will go with this flow next time around.

Having too much stuff in space and stations an such needs to be more limited, efficient, and have definite purposes in KSP life; I will improve on these ideas next KSP restart - all of which will be live streamed !

Please hop on over and give me some support; trollers come in now and then and say really bad and mean things; it is sad; I may try to apply to the KSP TV as I think my missions are very much capable and the quality of my streams will improve; I have an issue with OBS that needs sorting; so when .24 starts...I hope to improve my stream quality.

Thank you for your support; there are awesome modders and streamers out there...

I will be streamin a bit tonite.

Cmdr Zeta

Hi,

WOW v0.24 slated for yesterday?! UGH ! I didnt know it was that close ! This means, well I am streamin for an hour or so this morn...maybe once more today some time and maybe once tonite; I will be gone for the long weekend...but after the Science from Yukon ships come in - 2 - I will unlock all Science and test a few new things - sort of - maybe try this tonite - then it looks like a restart with the new 0.24 !

Open Glide crashes too; altho it is more subtle and I can play longer, it still crashes; it starts to lagg and kills the tech tree at around 300 megs of gameplay; just thought I would mention this. I am running 64 bit and am gonna try this on my dual core this week before the restart.

Cmdr Zeta

Tonite's Stream Info:

1) Re-adjust Tech Tree to increase Science Required...it is already 20% or so higher than default; we will be upping that another 20% or so in all vertical lines of nodes; specialized areas getting even more of a Science requirement.

2) Unlocking all nodes to test a few things and move more parts around; probly wont move them tho tonite.

I use Kerbin+ system with a few extra moons and it seems to help my gameplay.

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Sorry no stream tonite I am in a motel in New Yawk...blah oh well it is a trip and I am doing ok but cant wait to start v0.24 and start KSP all over again !!

Cmdr Zeta

Hello,

The Livestream will soon be active tonite; I am workin out some final bugs and mods; I hope to start at 2000EST; stream site in sig.

Cmdr Zeta

Hi,

Stream should be going up in a few minutes ...

I found a way to make missing Kerbals not respawn in the Persistance file; still cant cut funding so I am doing that on my own for now I will have to keep an eye on it.

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Looks like I am doing a Kerbin Contracts Missions Restart...I will still look for the cut in funding, but after the first round I dunno now; I would go past 1/2 cut due to the fact that the new Science constraints I have set in the tech tree make the game more demanding and particular; I ned hundreds of Science midgame; I need funds to get that extra Science so maybe the Science increase amount - roughly 30-40% more needed per nodes - will make up for the default fund useage.

I will look at the post though to find out how to change it if anyone replied; I am game for it, and I will be starting in a few minutes. Stream location in SIG below.

Cmdr Zeta

Hi,

In my better judgement and due to the fact I upped the Science requirements by 30-40% on all the nodes, I can see more trips being made; but worst is the seemingly high prices of the parts; that coupled with my slight overhaul of the default Tech Tree, the game will be difficult enough as it is.

With that in mind and a couple game runs, I am leaving the funds, resources, and rewards alone.

Thus I am goin for a 3rd restart...

Cmdr Zeta

Hello,

Stream will be in a few minutes - hardcore KSP No Kerbal respawn, no revert, increased Science 25-40% all nodes - cept for the planes which was cut back a little.

My Open Broadcast stream cuts in and out occasionally due to OBS issues sorry for that please bear with it...

Cmdr Zeta

Hello,

Barring some hiccups in OBS Streamer I will be streamin this morning...Kerbin Contracts:

No Kerbal Respawn

Funds back to normal default - losing funds on stages now; stage recovery works but each mission incurs a loss it seems; not sure if I will go broke! Acts like I am forced to win every contract the first time; ugh !

No reverts

Game saves used for game bugs only.

Stream location in SIG below.

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Stream up shortly...lots of tough science to get; contracts dwindling; choices to make...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Stream will be up shortly for a few hours ! Fulfilling contracts and Science gathering on Kerbin.

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Streamin this morning til noon EST time zone...Gatherin Kerbin Science to get that elusive Goo canister.

Cmdr Zeta

Stream will be up momentarily - Science gathering around Kerbin still - got new toys...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Well I am at a crossroads - 2 contracts and no Science to get until daylight and funds dwindling...

Streamin off and on til midnite or so tonite ...

Cmdr Zeta

Due to a game bug I had to redo contracts and I lost about 100 of them I guess so thats what I am doin tonite for a few hours.

Cmdr Zeta

Hi,

I am workin on the contracts; not spending Science yet; watched a few other streams to get ideas...well now the nuclear rockets look interesting; I could get them to test; it is things like this that make the game; I just hope I dont go broke and I didnt even change the funds settings.

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Preparing for tonite's Kerbalnaut rescue around Kerbin; orbit with supposedly more efficient engines...

Cmdr Zeta

Howdi,

Slight delay in launch...stream should be up shortly...

Cmdr Zeta

Hi,

After last nites 3 or so hours of problems, I am changin a few things as posted in my rage-quit thread cause I almost gave up on KSP.

I was surprised to see 2.3 gigs of game memory instead of the usual 3.3 giving me about 300 megs of game memory to play on; we will see what transpires...

I have to redesign my rescue rocket again I think I see where I went wrong...wish me luck!

I will be streamin off and all all day and tonite but it may not be posted on the calendar.

Cmdr Zeta
